SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off
! Validating Input :SET &COUNT# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_YAML_ORIGINAL_FILE_PATH# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_YAML_ORIGINAL_CONTENT# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &COUNT# NE 1 : STOP MSG, 50, "Please provide either original file path or content." :ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ Building java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "ConvertYAMLToFromJSONAction"
! Build java arguments : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_YAML_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YAML_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! yaml/json content : IF &UC4RB_YAML_ORIGINAL_FILE_PATH# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_YAML_ORIGINAL_FILE_PATH# : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_YAML_ORIGINAL_CONTENT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_YAML_TO_FILE : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH#,,"TASK" : ENDIF
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YAML_CMD#, " -originalfilepath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Convert to YAML or JSON : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_YAML_CMD#, " -converttype &UC4RB_YAML_JSON_CONVERT#")
! Modified download file path : IF &UC4RB_YAML_DOWNLOAD_PATH# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_YAML_DOWNLOAD_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_YAML_CMD# , " -downloadpath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT &UC4RB_YAML_CMD#
&UC4RB_YAML_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CONVERT YAML TO/FROM JSON ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CONVERT YAML TO/FROM JSON ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN
